version_description:
• Coin charts now remember your most recently used timeframe.
• Fixed a small column sorting bug on the home screen.

• Performance improvements
• We love to hear from our users! Join us on Telegram or send us an email. Contact info can be found in the app menu.

A big update, with some top user-requested features:

• Fiat positions - now available for all 34 fiat currencies we support.
• Transactions - we’ve renamed “Positions” to “Transactions” which allows you to add both *Buys* and *Sells* for better recording of your trades and performance.
• Watch-only - To monitor a coin without any holding, use the new Watch Only option
• As always, more improvements under the hood.

• Temporarily removed PIN Authentication after some users reported problems. This feature will be returned after we address this issue.
• Additional small improvements under the hood.
• A few small bug fixes to keep Blockfolio running smoothly.
Percent change added for individual Buy transactions.
This update includes additional fiat options as well as bug fixes and performance improvements.

-Added Ethereum base pairs (e.g. GNO/ETH, ETC/ETH)
-Additional bug fixes and performance improvements

- Nightmode
- Passcode Lock
- Hide Portfolio Balances
- Screenshot Sharing
- Swipe to Refresh Coin Details (Chart) Tab
- Refresh Button on Orderbook
- New Chart Themes Added
- Additional News Sources Available
- News Sharing Options
- Support for Tokens with same Ticker Symbol
- Total Value now copyable on Add/Edit Transaction screen

As always, more improvements under the hood.

- Nightmode
- Passcode Lock
- Hide Portfolio Balances
- Screenshot Sharing
- Swipe to Refresh Coin Details (Chart) Tab
- Refresh Button on Orderbook
- New Chart Themes Added
- Additional News Sources Available
- News Sharing Options
- Support for Tokens with same Ticker Symbol
- Total Value now copyable on Add/Edit Transaction screen
- Fixes Sorting Preference not saving for some users.

As always, more improvements under the hood.

- Token Percentage View
- Nightmode
- Passcode Lock
- Hide Portfolio Balances
- Screenshot Sharing
- Swipe to Refresh Coin Details (Chart) Tab
- Refresh Button on Orderbook
- New Chart Themes Added
- Additional News Sources Available
- News Sharing Options
- Support for Tokens with same Ticker Symbol
- Total Value now copyable on Add/Edit Transaction screen
- Few additional bug fixes.

As always, more improvements under the hood.

- Auto add/deduct holdings when adding transactions. No longer necessary to add two transactions.
- Sell all option
- Text size setting

As always, more improvements under the hood.

- Auto add/deduct holdings when adding transactions. No longer necessary to add two transactions.
- Sell all option
- Text size setting

As always, more improvements under the hood.

Tri-Toggle Upgrade. View your portfolio "Buterin Style" with our brand new Ethereum toggle option.

Upgrade now to add this feature, fix some bugs, and oil the backend of your beautiful Blockfolio.
Improved Coin Search / Add Coin and more improvements under the hood.
Improved Coin Search / Add Coin and more improvements under the hood.

Improvement under the hood and bug fixes.
We have a brand new feedback website. If you have a coin, exchange, or news source you want to see in the app, let us know here: https://feedback.blockfolio.com

Improvement under the hood and bug fixes.

Tri-Toggle Upgrade. View your portfolio "Buterin Style" with our brand new Ethereum toggle option.

Upgrade now to add this feature, fix some bugs, and oil the backend of your beautiful Blockfolio.

WOW, such amaze!

NEW LANGUAGES: Spanish, Portuguese, Korean, Japanese, and Russian
NEW EXCHANGES: MERCADOBITCOIN, Coinfloor, NEGOCIECOINS, NLexch, BitClude, TRADEOGRE, VELOX, itBit, DSX, OCTAEX, Coingi, TokenStore, Stocks.exchange, and Cryptohub!

Update now to view Blockfolio in your native language and fix some bugs.

Potato, Potahto. Update for the latest translation improvements along with design upgrades and minor bug fixes on the charts. We've even added a settings menu for our bilingual users. A big THANK YOU for all our the user feedback on this release.

Potato, Potahto. Update for the latest translation improvements along with design upgrades and minor bug fixes on the charts. We've even added a settings menu for our bilingual users. A big THANK YOU for all our the user feedback on this release.
More improvements under the hood.
Did you hear it? Did you see it? The formidable SIGNAL has arrived. Get the exclusive feed available ONLY in Blockfolio. Update to connect with your Token Teams now.

Markets are red,
Blockfolio is black,
“Wen Moon?”, you say?
Update now and let’s all get back on track.

Free multiple portfolios + brand new design + global average pricing = Blockfolio 2.0.
We hope you love it!

Easily back-up your portfolio(s) and access them across devices with user accounts
Hide small and zero balances by adjusting portfolio settings
Performance enhancements and bug fixes

Easily back-up your portfolio(s) and access them across devices with user accounts
Hide small and zero balances by adjusting portfolio settings
Performance enhancements and bug fixes

Free multiple portfolios + brand new design + global average pricing = Blockfolio 2.0.
We hope you love it!

Free multiple portfolios + brand new design + global average pricing = Blockfolio 2.0.
We hope you love it!

Free multiple portfolios + brand new design + global average pricing = Blockfolio 2.0.
We hope you love it!

- New Profit/Loss tab for coins lets you see values in BTC, ETH and fiat and view by trading pair
- UX/UI enhancements
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

- Added % change on transactions view
- UI enhancements
- Bug fixes and performance improvements

- New colorful look for portfolio charts
- UI improvements
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

- Ability to add transfer transactions to account for deposits, withdrawals, mining, airdrops etc
- Easily adjust your portfolio order via Manage Portfolios
- Duplicate a portfolio via Edit Portfolio Settings.

Now you can share Blockfolio Signal updates directly from within the app to Twitter, Facebook, text message and more.

Also, we simplified the screen for fiat transfers and squashed some pesky bugs.
Important bug fix and performance enhancements

Our 2.1 update is a big one:

-Markets tab to help you get a pulse on the overall crypto market and discover trending cryptocurrencies
-News Reader is now easier to access so you can create a personalized news feed experience from your favorite crypto publications
-Line charts can be toggled on for a simpler view
-Universal App Drawer for easier access to important settings, just swipe left from the right edge of the screen
-Fixed a number of bugs
-ICYMI we added a Share button to all Signals to easily share breaking news

A few additional fixes to our 2.1 release.

-Markets tab to help you get a pulse on the overall crypto market and discover trending cryptocurrencies
-News Reader is now easier to access so you can create a personalized news feed experience from your favorite crypto publications
-Line charts can be toggled on for a simpler view
-Universal App Drawer for easier access to important settings, just swipe left from the right edge of the screen
-ICYMI we added a Share button to all Signals to easily share breaking news

- Easily toggle your portfolio chart to view all time performance
- Swipe left anywhere on your portfolio home screen to seamlessly check other portfolios or add more
- Keep the Signal community honest with the new button to report Signals as “factually incorrect” or “shilling"
- Other bug fixes and enhancements

- Easily integrate with exchanges to automatically import your trades. This update includes support for Binance, Bitfinex, Bittrex, Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, OKEx, and Poloniex
- View trends on a two-year and three year timeframe with our improved coin and portfolio charts
- More portfolio sorting capabilities, bug fixes, and performance enhancements

- Easily integrate with exchanges to automatically import your trades. This update includes support for Binance, Bitfinex, Bittrex, Coinbase, Coinbase Pro, OKEx, and Poloniex
- View trends on a two-year and three year timeframe with our improved coin and portfolio charts
- More portfolio sorting capabilities, bug fixes, and performance enhancements

- Your favorite coin jumped in price! Try the new price change alerts. Simply set the percentage change and receive a notification.
- Added Signal categories to keep the conversation focused on Technical, Community, Marketing and Emergency updates
- More bug fixes and performance enhancements

- Improved line charts. Long press on graph to view price.
- View your average buy price in the Profit/Loss section
- Added ability to view markets tab in BTC
- Bug fixes and performance enhancements

Learn more about projects with the new Coin Profile tab.
Automatically import your transactions. Added 3 new exchanges: KuCoin, Kraken and HitBTC
